metadata.title: CVE-2021-21137 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to88.0.4324.96 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitiveinformation from disk via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
